changeSet.author: jdev
changeSet.sql: create table PLACEMARK ( PLACEMARK_ID int auto_increment primary key, ROUTE_ID INTEGER not null, LONGITUDE DOUBLE, LATITUDE DOUBLE, TIME BIGINT, ROW_TIME TIMESTAMP(26,6) ) ; create table ROUTE ( ROUTE_ID int auto_increment primary key, NAME VARCHAR(32) not null, ROUTE_DEVICE VARCHAR(32) ) ; create table POINT_INFO ( POINT_INFO_ID int auto_increment primary key, PLACEMARK_ID INTEGER, ROUTE_ID INTEGER, ROW_TIME TIMESTAMP(26,6) )
